name: E'tude Prologue: Yureugoku Kokoro no Katachi Portable
storyline:
The story is set in "Little Aid" sea of the city was also the stage of the (November 2005 release) "South Aose".
High school heroes of this work go is also the characters our "Little Aid" was through "Ten'otori high school".

The player, hero " Tatsuya Gunji and" " Hitomi Saeki and select one of the", find the goals of the protagonist that is sending the last of the high school life, we will then proceed towards it.

Hero who declined to graduation, or going to weave any story of this city on the stage is all up to the player
summary: A port of E'tude Prologue: Yureugoku Kokoro no Katachi for PlayStation Portable.
